content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 4 ** this easy crochet doily pattern will be a lovely addition to your home decor it is a beginner crochet doily pattern but an experienced crocheter will also enjoy it this pattern can be made in any size you want with an easy 2-round repeat you can use it crochet a coaster or to make a lovely crochet round placemats you can find the free video tutorial here https //youtu be/o2vmmn0pvoo - skill level easy - crochet terminology the pattern is written using english u s terminology materials needed - hooks size needed 3 5 mm / e - yarn needed - sport #2 weight yarn but can be made with any other weight yarn with a suitable hook - total amount of yarn needed - 85gr/212m/231yds - 6 stitch markers - finished size 17 in 43 cm diameter can be made any size you want if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design photos and video in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 4 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
